pullRequest.body:
The titular result is trivial, but to state the lemmas about the basis this uses, we need to generalize many results about `stdBasisMatrix`.

---

Do we have the results about the rank? I can only see [Module.finrank_linearMap](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/LinearAlgebra/FreeModule/Finite/Matrix.html#Module.finrank_linearMap) for linear maps

> Do we have the results about the rank?

Generalized.
